00027 CPrintItemList::CPrintItemList( PrintItemList* items,  QWidget *parent, const char *name ) : KListView(parent,name) {
00028     qDebug("Constructor of CPrinItemList");
00029     m_items = items;
00030     initView();
00031     
00032     insertItems(m_items);
00033 }
00034 
00035 CPrintItemList::~CPrintItemList(){
00036     for (m_items->first(); m_items->current(); m_items->next()) {
00037         if (m_items->current())
00038             m_items->current()->deleteListViewItem();
00039     }   
00040 }
00041 
00043 void CPrintItemList::initView(){
00044     setAllColumnsShowFocus(true);
00045     addColumn(i18n("Module"),-1);
00046     addColumn(i18n("From"), -1);
00047     addColumn(i18n("To"), -1);  
00048     addColumn(i18n("Style"), -1);   
00049     
00050     setSelectionMode( QListView::Extended );
00051 }
00052 
00054 void CPrintItemList::insertItems( PrintItemList* itemList ) {
00055 //  qDebug("CPrintItemList::insertItems( printItemList* itemList )");
00056     const bool sameList = (itemList == m_items);
00057     for(itemList->last(); itemList->current(); itemList->prev() ) {
00058         if (!sameList)
00059             m_items->append(itemList->current());
00060         itemList->current()->listViewItem(this);    //insert the QListViewItem into the list
00061     }
00062 }
00063 
00065 void CPrintItemList::setItems( PrintItemList* itemList ){
00066     for (m_items->first(); m_items->current(); m_items->next()) {
00067         if (m_items->current())
00068             m_items->current()->deleteListViewItem();
00069     }
00070     insertItems( itemList );
00071 }
00072 
00074 void CPrintItemList::newPage(){
00075 }
00076 
00078 void CPrintItemList::deleteSelectedItems(){
00079     QList<QListViewItem> items = selectedItems();   
00080     if (!items.count())
00081         return;
00082     const bool autoDelete = items.autoDelete();
00083     CPrintItem* p = 0;
00084     CPrintItem::ListViewItem* item = 0;
00085     for (items.first(); items.current(); items.next()) {
00086         item = dynamic_cast<CPrintItem::ListViewItem*>(items.current());
00087         if (item) {
00088             if (!(p = item->printItem()))
00089                 continue;
00090             p->deleteListViewItem();
00091             m_items->removeRef(p);          
00092             if (!autoDelete)
00093                 delete p;
00094         }
00095     }
00096 }
00097 
00099 void CPrintItemList::moveUp(){
00100     if (currentItem() && currentItem()->itemAbove() &&  currentItem()->itemAbove()->itemAbove()) {
00101         currentItem()->moveItem( currentItem()->itemAbove()->itemAbove() );
00102     }
00103 }
00104 
00106 void CPrintItemList::moveDown(){
00107     if (currentItem() && currentItem()->itemBelow())
00108         currentItem()->moveItem( currentItem()->itemBelow() );
00109 }
00110 
00112 void CPrintItemList::applyStyleToSelected( CStyle* style){
00113     CPrintItem* printItem;
00114     CPrintItem::ListViewItem* item;
00115     QList<QListViewItem> list = selectedItems();
00116     for ( QListViewItem* i = list.first(); i; i = list.next()) {
00117         if ((item = dynamic_cast<CPrintItem::ListViewItem*>(i))) {
00118             printItem = item->printItem();
00119             printItem->setStyle(style);
00120             printItem->updateListViewItem();
00121         }
00122     }
00123 }
